author: Ross Burden
method: In a large bowl whisk together the egg yolk, shallot and vinegar. Gradually add the oil while whisking to create a thick emulsion, and then season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  Add the beans to the dressing and mix together.  To serve, pile the beans high on a plate.
ingredients: 1 free-range egg yolk,  ½ shallot, finely chopped,  ½tsp white wine vinegar,  50ml/2fl oz olive oil,  100g/3½oz green beans, blanched, refreshed,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
